creditline: Anonymous gift in honor of Bill and Libby Clark
description: straight sides; rounded at bottom with ring foot; wide inward-flaring rim; open wall between inner vertical strips of bamboo and outer woven bamboo, with some strips on outer wall twisted with slightly more golden-colored thin bamboo; black lacquer inner flower container
marks: Signature on underside on tab, signed: [隣松] {Rinshō}
title: Flower basket with annular pattern
